name: THE ZONGO - Luxury Hotel Template
description: This template is ideal for hotel, hostel, resort, restaurant, pub, spa wellness, hotel B&B, vacation room/apartment rental etc, and those who need an easy, attractive and effective way to share their work with clients. If you would like to create a page that has a strong first impression and intrigues everyone, THE CAPPA template is the tool you need. Let it impress you with the live preview page. It’s super easy to customize so it’ll suit your needs.

name: Kip Fit (Coming soon)
description: The theme features carefully designed fitness consultant, training, exercise, crossfit and sport shop templates ideal for creating modern sportswear, gym equipment and workout websites. It also comes with the Timetable.! Stay strong, Keep Feet!
